title: Ukraine To Face -30 Degrees Celsius Freeze As Russia Attacks Energy Grid
summary_full: Ukraine's state weather agency on Thursday forecast a drastic dip in temperatures to as low as minus 30C in coming days, as authorities race to restore heating and electricity services and President Volodymyr Zelensky warned of fresh Russian attacks
